title: Analyze to-do's for new features to add.
description:
GitHub Issue: #1

## Problem to Solve

We have a lot of work in progress and don't know what the next thing to do is. We should migrate any outstanding issues to GitHub. 

## Solution Proposal

Work our outstanding work to do, improvements to make, features that have been half implemented, and create relative respective issues for each of them in GitHub.
